statements: SELECT cocktail_name, price FROM cocktails ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM cocktails WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY cocktail_name ASC;
SELECT cocktail_name, ingredients FROM cocktails WHERE cocktail_name LIKE 'Margarita%';
SELECT ingredient_name, price FROM ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC;
SELECT cocktail_name, price, ingredients FROM cocktails JOIN ingredients ON cocktails.cocktail_id = ingredients.ingredient_id ORDER BY cocktail_name ASC;
SELECT cocktail_name, price FROM cocktails
SELECT * FROM cocktails WHERE price > 10
SELECT cocktail_name, ingredients FROM cocktails WHERE price < 20
SELECT cocktail_name, price FROM cocktails ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT cocktail_name, ingredients FROM cocktails ORDER BY cocktail_name ASC
SELECT * FROM cocktails;
SELECT cocktail_name, cocktail_price FROM cocktails;
SELECT cocktail_name, ingredient_name FROM cocktails JOIN ingredients ON cocktails.cocktail_id = ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_price > 5.00;
SELECT * FROM cocktails ORDER BY cocktail_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM cocktails WHERE cocktail_price > 10
SELECT cocktail_name, cocktail_price FROM cocktails ORDER BY cocktail_price DESC
SELECT cocktail_name, ingredient_name FROM cocktails JOIN ingredients ON cocktails.cocktail_id = ingredients.ingredient_id
SELECT cocktail_name, ingredient_name FROM cocktails JOIN ingredients ON cocktails.cocktail_id = ingredients.ingredient_id ORDER BY cocktail_name ASC
SELECT cocktail_name, SUM(ingredient_price) AS total_price FROM cocktails JOIN ingredients ON cocktails.cocktail_id = ingredients.ingredient_id GROUP BY cocktail_name
SELECT cocktail_name, price FROM cocktails WHERE price < 10
SELECT * FROM cocktails WHERE cocktail_name = 'Margarita'

SELECT cocktail_name, ingredient_name FROM cocktails JOIN cocktail_ingredients ON cocktails.cocktail_id = cocktail_ingredients.cocktail_id JOIN ingredients ON cocktail_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id
SELECT cocktail_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM cocktails JOIN cocktail_ingredients ON cocktails.cocktail_id = cocktail_ingredients.cocktail_id GROUP BY cocktail_name
SELECT cocktail_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM cocktails GROUP BY cocktail_name ORDER BY average_price DESC
SELECT cocktail_name, price FROM cocktails WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT ingredient_id, ingredient_name, price FROM ingredients WHERE price < 5 ORDER BY ingredient_id ASC
SELECT cocktail_id, cocktail_name, price, ingredient_id, quantity FROM cocktail_ingredients WHERE quantity >= 1.5 ORDER BY cocktail_id, quantity DESC

SELECT cocktail_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM cocktails JOIN cocktail_ingredients USING(cocktail_id) JOIN ingredients USING(ingredient_id) WHERE quantity > 2 AND price < 15 ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM cocktails JOIN cocktail_ingredients USING(cocktail_id) JOIN ingredients USING(ingredient_id) WHERE price > 5 AND quantity < 2 ORDER BY price ASC, quantity DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM cocktails;
SELECT name, price FROM cocktails WHERE price > 10;
SELECT id, name, cost FROM ingredients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT c.name AS cocktail_name, i.name AS ingredient_name, ci.quantity FROM cocktails c JOIN cocktail_ingredients ci ON c.id = ci.cocktail_id JOIN ingredients i ON ci.ingredient_id = i.id;
SELECT name, COUNT(*) FROM categories GROUP BY name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM cocktails WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM cocktails INNER JOIN categories ON cocktails.id = categories.id WHERE categories.name = 'Special' ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT cocktails.name, ingredients.name, cost FROM cocktails INNER JOIN cocktail_ingredients ON cocktails.id = cocktail_ingredients.cocktail_id INNER JOIN ingredients ON cocktail_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.id;

SELECT cocktails.name, SUM(quantity) AS total_ingredients FROM cocktails INNER JOIN cocktail_ingredients ON cocktails.id = cocktail_ingredients.cocktail_id GROUP BY cocktails.name HAVING total_ingredients > 5;
SELECT categories.id, categories.name, COUNT(*) AS total_cocktails FROM categories INNER JOIN cocktails ON categories.id = cocktails.id GROUP BY categories.id ORDER BY total_cocktails DESC;
SELECT * FROM cocktails;
SELECT cocktail_name, cocktail_description FROM cocktails;
SELECT ingredient_name, ingredient_type, ingredient_quantity FROM ingredients;
SELECT * FROM cocktail_ingredients WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT cocktail_name, price, currency FROM cocktails JOIN prices ON cocktails.cocktail_id = prices.cocktail_id;
SELECT * FROM cocktails;
SELECT cocktail_name, cocktail_description FROM cocktails ORDER BY cocktail_name DESC;
SELECT c.cocktail_name, i.ingredient_name, ci.quantity FROM cocktails c, ingredients i, cocktail_ingredients ci WHERE c.cocktail_id = ci.cocktail_id AND i.ingredient_id = ci.ingredient_id;
SELECT c.cocktail_name, ip.price, ip.currency FROM cocktails c INNER JOIN prices p ON c.cocktail_id = p.cocktail_id INNER JOIN ingredient_prices ip ON p.price_id = ip.price_id WHERE ip.price > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT c.cocktail_name, i.ingredient_name, i.ingredient_type FROM cocktails c LEFT JOIN ingredients i ON c.cocktail_id = i.ingredient_id WHERE i.ingredient_type = 'Alcohol';
